from datetime import datetime

from django.db.models import Sum
from rest_framework import serializers

from client.models.credit import Credit
from consts.common import OPEN_APPLICATION_CODE, OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE, RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,\
    TRANSFER_APPLICATION_CODE, FINANCE_APPLY_CODE
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField
from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, CreditClear, Business, ReviewLog, CreditClearDetail
from client.models.user import S1User



[文档]class CreditsValidSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    可用授信列表序列化器
    """
    receive_company = serializers.CharField(source="receive_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="capital_company.name")
    # 剩余有效期
    remaining_validity = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    # 已用额度 元
    used_quota = FenToYuanFloatField(source="total_used_quota")
    # 可用授信额度 元
    available_quota = FenToYuanFloatField()
    quota = FenToYuanFloatField()


[文档]    def get_remaining_validity(self, obj):
        start = obj.start
        end = obj.end
        if datetime.now().date() < start:
            return 0
        now = datetime.now().date()
        return (end-now).days



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Credit
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'agreement_no', 'receive_company', 'capital_company',
            'available_quota', 'used_quota', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate',
            'remaining_validity', 'start', 'end', 'quota'
        ]




[文档]class InvalidCreditsValidSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    历史授信列表序列化器
    """
    receive_company = serializers.CharField(source="receive_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="capital_company.name")
    # 累计融资额度  =∑ X信所有叶子节点中已融资状态融资金额
    total_finance_used = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    # 授信使用率  累计使用额度/授信额度    注意可以大于100%
    used_percent = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    # 总融资率  累计融资额度 /授信额度   注意可以大于100%
    finance_percent = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    # 累计使用额度 元
    total_used = FenToYuanFloatField(source="total_used_quota")
    quota = FenToYuanFloatField()


[文档]    def get_total_finance_used(self, obj):
        credit_id = obj.id
        total_query = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
            credit__id=credit_id, is_valid=True,
            review_status="pass",
            business__name="financing"
        ).aggregate(total=Sum("amount"))
        total = total_query.get("total") if total_query.get("total") else 0
        return FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(total)



[文档]    def get_used_percent(self, obj):
        total_used_quota = obj.total_used_quota
        quota = obj.quota
        used_percent = float(total_used_quota) / quota * 100
        return round(used_percent, 2)



[文档]    def get_finance_percent(self, obj):
        quota = obj.quota
        total_finance_used = self.get_total_finance_used(obj)
        finance_percent = float(total_finance_used) / quota * 100
        return round(finance_percent, 2)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Credit
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'agreement_no', 'receive_company', 'capital_company',
            'total_finance_used', 'used_percent', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate',
            'finance_percent', 'total_used', 'end', 'quota'
        ]




[文档]class CreditDetailSerizalizer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """授信详情序列化器"""

    quota = FenToYuanFloatField()
    receive_company = serializers.CharField(source='receive_company.name')
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='capital_company.name')
    credit_clear_type = serializers.CharField(source='credit_clear_type.desc_name')


[文档]    class Meta:
        """原始信息"""
        model = Credit
        fields = (
            'id', 'credit_number', 'enclosure', 'receive_company', 'capital_company',
            'quota', 'start', 'end', 'agreement_no', 'credit_clear_type',
            'financing_annualized_interest_rate', 'technical_service_rate', 'information_consultation_rate',
            'punishment_rate', 'is_show_all_proccess',
        )




[文档]class OpenSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信开立列表
    """
    company = serializers.CharField(source="company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    status_ch = serializers.CharField(source="get_review_status_display")
    status = serializers.CharField(source="review_status")
    # 开立申请日期 开立提交成功对应的日期
    created_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    s1_user = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)


[文档]    def get_created_at(self, obj):
        """
        从日志表里 找到对应的开立申请状态的数据，取最新的时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        create_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=obj.id,
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            handle_status='done',
            result='pass',
            work_flow__code=OPEN_APPLICATION_CODE,
        ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
            "created_at", flat=True
        ).first()
        try:
            return create_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"



[文档]    def get_s1_user(self, obj):
        name = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(id=obj.s1_user_id).first()
        return name.nick_name



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'number', 'company', 'capital_company', 'amount', 'created_at',
            'promise_pay_at', 'status', 'status_ch', 's1_user', 'confirm_at'
        ]




[文档]class ReceivesSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信待接收列表
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    business = serializers.CharField(source="business.name")
    business_ch = serializers.CharField(source='business.desc_name')
    status_ch = serializers.CharField(source="get_review_status_display")
    status = serializers.CharField(source="review_status")
    surplus_day = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)  # x信金额


[文档]    def get_surplus_day(self, obj):
        expire_at = obj.expire_at
        now = datetime.now().date()
        if not expire_at:
            return 0
        return (expire_at - now).days if (expire_at - now).days > 0 else 0



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'company', 'transfer_company', 'capital_company',
            'amount', 'promise_pay_at', 'business', 'status_ch', 'business_ch',
            'surplus_day', 'status'
        ]




[文档]class AvailablesSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信可用
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    business = serializers.CharField(source="business.name")
    status = serializers.CharField(source="review_status")
    status_ch = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)   # x信金额
    net_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)  # x信净额
    surplus_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="balance")  # x信余额
    financing_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="has_financing")  # 已融资金额
    transfer_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="has_transfer")  # 已转让金额
    # 接收日期 -- 开立接收或转让接收的日期
    receive_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_status_ch(self, obj):
        """
        状态写死，用于前端展示
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        return "持有可用"



[文档]    def get_receive_at(self, obj):
        """
        开立接收或转让接收的日期
        从日志表里 找到对应的开立申请状态的数据，取最新的时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        type = Business.objects.filter(id=obj.business.id).values_list('name', flat=True).first()
        if type == 'open':
            receive_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_id=obj.id,
                data_table='credit_certificate',
                handle_status='done',
                result='pass',
                work_flow__code=OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
            ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
                "created_at", flat=True
            ).first()
            try:
                return receive_at.date()
            except Exception as e:
                return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"

        receive_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=obj.id,
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            handle_status='done',
            result='pass',
            work_flow__code=RECEIVE_CONFIRM_CODE,
        ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
            "created_at", flat=True
        ).first()
        try:
            return receive_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'company', 'transfer_company', 'capital_company',
            'amount', 'receive_at', 'promise_pay_at', 'status_ch', 'transfer_amount',
            'status', 'net_amount', 'surplus_amount', 'financing_amount', 'business',
            'confirm_at'
        ]




[文档]class TransfersSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信转让列表
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    receive_company = serializers.CharField(source="company.name")
    status_ch = serializers.CharField(source="get_review_status_display")
    status = serializers.CharField(source="review_status")
    transfer_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source='amount')
    transfer_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_transfer_at(self, obj):
        """
        从日志表里 找到对应的转让申请状态的数据，取最新的时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        transfer_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=obj.id,
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            handle_status='done',
            result='pass',
            work_flow__code=TRANSFER_APPLICATION_CODE,
        ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
            "created_at", flat=True
        ).first()
        try:
            return transfer_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"

        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'company', 'transfer_amount', 'receive_company',

        ]




[文档]class FinancingsSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信融资列表
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    # 转让给它的企业
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    # 融资申请中的融资申请日期
    financing_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    status_ch = serializers.CharField(source="get_review_status_display")
    status = serializers.CharField(source="review_status")
    financing_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="amount")


[文档]    def get_financing_at(self, obj):
        """
        从日志表里 找到对应的融资申请状态的数据，取最新的时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        financing_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=obj.id,
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            handle_status='done',
            result='pass',
            work_flow__code=FINANCE_APPLY_CODE,
        ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
            "created_at", flat=True
        ).first()
        try:
            return financing_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"

        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'company', 'transfer_company', 'capital_company',
            'financing_at', 'status_ch', 'status', 'financing_amount', 'confirm_at'
        ]




[文档]class ReturnsSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信已退回列表
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    status = serializers.BooleanField(source="is_valid")
    business_ch = serializers.CharField(source="business.desc_name")
    business = serializers.CharField(source="business.name")
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)
    return_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_return_at(self, obj):
        """
        从日志表里 找到被驳回的数据，取最新的时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        return_at = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=obj.id,
            data_table='credit_certificate',
            handle_status='done',
            result='reject',
        ).order_by('-created_at').values_list(
            "created_at", flat=True
        ).first()
        try:
            return return_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'amount', 'return_at',
            'status', 'business', 'business_ch'
        ]




[文档]class ExpiresSerializers(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    x信管理-x信到期列表
    """
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.name")
    business = serializers.CharField(source="business.name")
    is_clear = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    clear_principal = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    clear_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_clear_at(self, obj):
        """
        清分时间
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        is_clear = CreditClearDetail.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate=obj.id,
            credit_certificate__is_valid=True
        ).only(
            'status', 'created_at'
        )
        if not is_clear:
            return None
        return_at = is_clear.first().created_at
        try:
            return return_at.date()
        except Exception as e:
            return f"ReviewLog表数据不全:{e}"



[文档]    def get_is_clear(self, obj):
        clear = CreditClearDetail.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate__id=obj.id, credit_certificate__is_valid=True
        ).only("status")
        is_clear = clear.first().status == "cleared" if clear else False
        return is_clear



[文档]    def get_clear_principal(self, obj: CreditCertificate):
        """
        分 转 元
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        # 如果是已经清分了 查询清分记录
        if hasattr(obj, "creditcleardetail"):
            return FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(obj.creditcleardetail.net_amount)
        # 如果没清分 等于 入账-出账
        return FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(obj.entry_principal-obj.out_principal)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id', 'credit_number', 'company', 'transfer_company', 'promise_pay_at',
            'clear_at', 'clear_principal', 'is_clear', 'business', 'confirm_at'
        ]
